title: BEST OF 2021
itunes:title: BEST OF 2021
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
MOTIVERSITY'S BEST SPEECHES OF 2021! These are some of our Best Motivational Speeches of the Year!! It's been a challenging year for many people but we've been there for you and so we're taking a look back at our most epic inspirational speeches and we compiled them into one giant hour-long motivational speech featuring Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity), Marcus Taylor (https://bit.ly/MarcusTaylorMotiversity), Walter Bond (https://bit.ly/WalterBondMotiversity), Jessica Houston (https://bit.ly/DrJessicaHoustonMotiversity), Brian Bullock (https://bit.ly/BrianBullockMotiversity), Will Hollis (https://bit.ly/WilliamHollisMotiversity), Cole DaSilva (https://bit.ly/ColeDaSilvaMotiversity) and more. From everyone at Motiversity, the team, the speakers, and myself, thank you so much for all of your support this year!


Music by Secession Studios (https://bit.ly/SecessionStudiosYouTube), Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic), Audiojungle (https://audiojungle.net/), Audiomachine: https://www.youtube.com/audiomachine, Epic Motiversity Music: https://bit.ly/EpicMotiversityMusic, and Rok Nardin (https://bit.ly/RokNardinMusic).




Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
